name: banking.system.api
author: robert sims
description: This is a free node.js and express.js api that only consist of the backend and can be tested out using postman, rest client and thunder client or other api testing software to handle json format data sharing and accessing. It works as a banking system whereby banking of money and transactions in real life have been brought into plain code with express and node.js as an api. Some banking services like loan, transfer, withdraw and depositing services provided in a bank are also supported by this api inform of codes
